attributes.action: Politicians of all parties stop plotting and start fixing the EU referendum mess
attributes.background: That parties on all sides of the House of Commons stop their leadership plotting and instead start working, together, on fixing the mess that has been caused by the result of the referendum held on 23 June 2016 on EU membership - which is the job we, the people, actually pay them to do.

rejection.details: This petition calls for action from political parties, not the Government or Parliament.
